toast.shortcut_unavailable: Fitur iki ora kasedhiya, gunakake WebUI X.

support_button.title: Dukung Aku
support_button.description: Encore Tweaks gratis lan bakal tetep gratis kanggo sapa wae. Nanging, sampeyan bisa nuduhake rasa peduli kanthi nyumbang.

learn_encore.title: Sinau Encore
learn_encore.description: Sinau carane nganggo Encore Tweaks lan fitur-fiture.

lite_mode.title: Pepeksa Mode Lite
lite_mode.description: Aktifake Mode Lite kanggo kabeh game

device_mitigation.title: Mitigasi Piranti
device_mitigation.description: Atasi masalah khusus piranti ing Encore Tweaks

log_level.title: Level Log
log_level.description: Pilih sepiro detail cathetan operasional Encore Tweaks

create_shortcut.title: Gawe Pintasan
create_shortcut.description: Gawe pintasan ing layar ngarep kanggo akses cepet mbukak Encore Tweaks

game_settings.title: Pengaturan Game
game_settings.dnd_mode_description: Ngeblok notifikasi lan telpon pas ngegame

lite_mode.title: Mode Lite
lite_mode.brief: Mode lite ngurangi panas lan nggunakake daya kanthi ngedhunake frekuensi CPU. Setelan iki ditrapake kanggo kabeh game.

device_mitigation.title: Mitigasi Piranti
device_mitigation.brief: Mitigasi iki mateni tweaks sing mbokmenawa ora cocok kanggo piranti tartamtu. Jarke mati wae kecuali nek ana masalah.

cpu_governor.title: Governor CPU
cpu_governor.default_description: Kanggo profil seimbang lan performa pas mode lite aktif
cpu_governor.brief: CPU governor kuwi algoritma sing ngatur frekuensi prosesor kanthi otomatis, sing mengaruhi performa lan baterei.

modal.performance_warning: Nyetel governor menyang performance bakal nggawe hp panas banget lan baterei cepet entek. Sampeyan yakin arep nganggo governor iki?
